title: Davi Oliveira’s CV
text:
Physicist, Mathematician, Cambridge professor.

isaac@applesdofall.org | My wikipedia page



Standing on the shoulders of giants


Laws of motion, gravitation, minting coins, disliking Robert Hooke



Cooling, power series, optics, alchemy, planetary motions, apples.




1654-1660 The King’s School, Grantham.
June 1661 - now Trinity College, Cambridge

Sizar

1667 - death Trinity College, Cambridge

Fellow




2012 President, Royal Society, London, UK
Associate, French Academy of Science, Paris, France






1669 Newton Sir I, De analysi per æquationes numero terminorum infinitas.
1669 Lectiones opticæ.
etc. etc. etc.



2012 Infinitesimal calculus for solutions to physics problems, SMBC patent 001




1600 Royal Mint, London

Warden
Minted coins

1600 Lucasian professor of Mathematics, Cambridge University

title: Davi Oliveira’s CV
text:
Currently
B.S. in Business Analytics at BYU–Idaho
IT Business Analyst Lead | Power BI Intern | Fitness Franchise Owner

Specialized in
Power BI Dashboards, Business Strategy, Marketing, Data Visualization


Research Interests
Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Predictive Modeling, Consumer Behavior

title: Davi Oliveira’s CV
text:
Education
May 2025
Brigham Young University–Idaho, Rexburg, ID
B.S. in Business Analytics
- Minor in Marketing
- Merit Scholarship Recipient
- Academic Affairs Coordinator at SHPE BYU-Idaho
- Member of Corporate Finance Society (CFS)
- GPA: 3.8

title: Davi Oliveira’s CV
text:
Experience
Nov 2021 – Present
IT Business Analyst Lead, Brigham Young University–Idaho
- Lead a team of 4 employees, providing guidance and training
- Developed and analyzed multiple Power BI dashboards for decision-making
- Helped streamline data collection processes and improve data quality
Sep 2023 – Present
Power BI Analyst Intern, Good2Go Stores
- Developed finance department dashboards for revenue optimization
- Analyzed large datasets (millions of rows) daily
- Created interactive dashboards for clear financial insights
Nov 2021 – Present
Business Owner – Franchisee, Smart Fit, São Paulo, Brazil
- Manage daily operations of Latin America’s largest gym franchise
- Implemented strategies to boost customer retention and revenue
May 2021 – Nov 2021
Paid Ads Analyst, Making Publicidade, São Paulo, Brazil
- Created and analyzed ad campaigns across Facebook, Google, and LinkedIn
- Tracked and optimized campaign performance for client businesses

title: Davi Oliveira’s CV
text:
Volunteer Experience
May 2019 – Jul 2021
Volunteer Representative, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
- Served in Argentina and Brazil
- Gained fluency in Spanish within 3 months
- Led data-driven improvements across multiple volunteer groups

title: Davi Oliveira’s CV
text:
Skills & Technical Competences

Computer Skills: Power BI, Tableau, MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint

Languages: Portuguese (Native), English (Fluent), Spanish (Fluent)

Programming: Intermediate Python, MySQL, R

Certifications: Alteryx Core Certification
